thread.title: Drawing Winners Picked for Chance to Buy Cubs' NLCS Tickets
thread.title_full: Drawing Winners Picked for Chance to Buy Cubs' NLCS Tickets

title: Drawing Winners Picked for Chance to Buy Cubs' NLCS Tickets
text:
Getty Images Cubs fans looking for postseason tickets may want to check their emails. The Cubs announced Thursday that winners of a recent random drawing have been selected for their chance to purchase tickets to the National League Championship Series games at Wrigley Field. The online-only ticket purchase opportunity begins Friday at noon and ends at 11:59 p.m. CT. Cubs NLCS Schedule: Game Dates, Times Fans who were selected after entering the Cubs Postseason Ticket Purchase Opportunity will have a one-time chance to purchase up to four tickets to the games. Tickets will be available on a first-come, first-serve basis, and being selected in the drawing does not guarantee the opportunity to purchase tickets to a postseason game. Non-winners were also notified that their entry will continue to be included in any additional random drawings that take place in the 2015 postseason. Teen Charged With Teacher's Murder Moved to Hospital Fans can also continue to register for a chance to purchase tickets for potential 2015 World Series games at Wrigley Field. The registration period for those tickets ends at noon on Friday. Fans hoping to catch a ticket on the secondary market may have to pay a pretty penny, according to recent reports. Published 2 minutes ago
